isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - OUTER CAB DOOR HANDLE

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Outer Cab Door Handle on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 58
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install door lock cylinder lever (Item 2) on outer cab door handle (Item 3), driver side shown.
Install door lock control rod (Item 1) into door lock cylinder lever (Item 2) on outer cab door handle (Item 3), driver side shown.

Install cab door lock cylinder, refer to
CAB DOOR LOCK CYLINDER
. For installing cab door lock cylinder, refer to Install Cab Door Lock Cylinder on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 57
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If the hanger support bracket (Item 2) was removed from outer cab door handle (Item 1), position the slot (Item 3) in the hanger support bracket over the T shaped locking tab (item 4) on the outer cab door handle and rotate hanger support bracket clockwise to lock it in place, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 56
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide control rod (Item 5) coming from the cab door latch (Item 4) into mounting hole at the top of outer cab door handle (Item 2). Rotate outer cab door handle to position it on the control rod properly, driver side shown.
Slide the control rod (Item 1) coming from the outer cab door handle (Item 2) into the lock lever (Item 3) of the cab door latch (Item 4), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 55
for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para:
With the cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 46)
placed on a suitable work surface. Position the hanger support bracket (Item 4) of the outer cab door handle (Item 1) in place at window run channel (Item 2) and slide the hanger support bracket into window run channel until the locking tab (Item 3) locks it in place, driver side shown.

Install cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to
MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY
. For installing cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Install Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Install cab door vapor barrier, refer to
CAB DOOR VAPOR BARRIER
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
. If cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Install cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab. If cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side outer cab door handle.
